cleaned_text: Patient & Visitor Resources We are rewriting healthcare, together We are rewriting healthcare, together At BMC, we're modeling a new kind of excellence in healthcare. We are dedicated to delivering innovative care that bridges our expertise and your individual needs, so you can be your healthiest self. Together, we're making an impact and building a healthier, more equitable, and thriving Boston.
